description: Improper access control vulnerability in GROWI prior to v5.1.4 (v5 series) and versions prior to v4.5.25 (v4 series) allows a remote authenticated attacker to bypass access restriction and download the markdown data from the pages set to private by the other users.

product.name: GROWI v5 series and v4 series

enisaIdProduct.product_version: versions prior to v5.1.4 (v5 series) and versions prior to v4.5.25 (v4 series)
